html:
11.8.19  1:39 am   what does the umbrella mean

     it's sort of like a way to bring everything i do under one category. i used to think i wanted to make an infinite number of aliases and alternate sites, but then i realized there wasn't enough time for that, so i had to adopt an umbrella strategy

11.8.19  1:37 am   How strongly do you consider the left and right hands of a drummer when programming the drums for your songs?  Or do you perform it in real time somehow on your keyboard?

     it's always played. that's the only way to get good dynamics. but some time i imagine being in the drummer's chair, for inspiration

11.8.19  1:32 am   do people often point out how gorgeous you are?

     only if the lighting is really good

      if not, lemme say it.

11.8.19  1:20 am   Whats your greatest strength billiam

     probably my muscles

11.8.19  1:14 am   have you ever had a job in retail

     absolutely. it changed my life

11.8.19  1:07 am   have interview tomorrow. what tactics should i use to be an Effective Candidate

     try asking them questions. give them a taste of their own medicine

11.8.19  12:23 am   i think if you did vlogs it would be kinda pretty neat

     that's true, i might have an even neater way to do it

11.8.19  12:23 am   what is your favorite song of yours? or do you hate all of them?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.7.19  11:42 pm   If something is unreasonably reasonable, does that make it reasonably unreasonable?

     let me perform some calculations, yes

11.7.19  11:29 pm   do drummers wear shoes usually, i'm at a live show rn and just realized the drummer onstage is barefoot and then realized i've never actually stopped to notice whether drummers wear shoes or not

     yes, most drummers wear shoes. it's probably important to play with the shoes that you are most used to playing with, and that may be different for each person. i've heard that jim keltner prefers cowboy boots

11.7.19  11:18 pm   What kind of music do you listen too that isn't your own?

     whatever is playing

11.7.19  11:07 pm   What's your purpose for living?

     i was thinking of inventing the wheel. can you imagine, everything just rolling around

11.7.19  10:47 pm   did now already happen?

     yes but it's only going to keep happening

11.7.19  9:50 pm   what are your solutions to climate change

     change it more. it's still not right

11.7.19  9:49 pm   Would you consider entering an intense hot dog eating competition?

     absolutely not

11.7.19  9:49 pm   what are your thoughts on thoughts

     i'll have to think about that

11.7.19  9:48 pm   when is ok boomer an appropriate response

     always. that thing's got wings

11.7.19  9:39 pm   what's the most famous actor

     bigbird

11.7.19  9:37 pm   when is bill wurtz 2 releasing

     i'm having a countdown timer

11.7.19  9:30 pm   i am using your song "at the airport terminal" for a school project, is there literally any deeper meaning to the song or should i pick another song 

     the meaning of any song is as deep as the deepest oceans. that's just how songs work

11.7.19  9:02 pm   did you sing while you were going through puberty,

     no, but i probably should have

      and if so, how did you deal with voice cracks? i'm really scared i'm gonna damage my voice by accident singing too high or too low as it changes

     maybe just don't .. scream? and take breaks and drink a lot of water, i'm not really an expert

11.7.19  8:57 pm   Can you teach me how to stop worrying about life?

     i am trying

11.7.19  8:50 pm   run away with me to the tip of long island

     that sounds pretty cool but i think it gets very private and expensive out there

11.7.19  8:43 pm   what would be classified as a bad thing

     dooms day

11.7.19  8:41 pm   Why does nobody that I've seen ask you a question capitalize the I this is basic grammar!!!

     i actually don't like capitalizing i, i don't think it's necessary, and it certainly doesn't make it any easier to read. i usually use the 5 finger rule of grammar: if it doesn't improve communication then don't use it to communicate

11.7.19  8:31 pm   When you will make a new video?

     i'm having a countdown timer

11.7.19  8:03 pm   is h the perfect letter

     no

11.7.19  7:23 pm   I'm now almost 1 year in studying on how to play the piano and I enjoy it, am I in a good track?

     it seems like it

11.7.19  7:21 pm   Do you play online games?

     no

11.7.19  6:32 pm   do you ever just listen to music and think "wow that's pretty dang cool i wonder if i can do that as well" so then you do the music but it sounds really really bad and then you get really demotivated

     yes, for me that especially happens when trying to get a final mix and listening to someone else's final mix

      i dunno maybe making music just isnt for me i feel perfectly ok just listening to it but then again i feel like itd be really fun to actually do

     sometimes a fun thing is to try to make it sound worse. you'd be surprised how quickly it may come full circle

11.7.19  6:25 pm   Hypnosis real?

     yes

      If so, can you hypnotise yourself?

     probably already am

11.7.19  5:30 pm   are thoughts real? 

     they are a blueprint for real things

11.7.19  5:25 pm   There is this annoying kid that sits next to my locker everyday, (he's probably autistic), he is always watching these annoying videos that really annoy me, he tries to act cool despite literally having no friends, and I really want to strangle the shit out of him.
What do I do?

     first thing you wanna do is don't strangle him, then the next step is say hi and get to know him

11.7.19  4:56 pm   hurry up pls

     i will

11.7.19  4:37 pm   Why do people ignore that the world is ust kinda... crumbling to pieces

     why do people ignore that the world is being put together
11.7.19  4:26 pm   Yo Bill, can the answer on this question be in rainbow colored text?

11.7.19  4:23 pm   What's the secret ingredient(s) in CocaCola? 

     pepsi

11.7.19  4:09 pm   what would you try to solve the loneliness epidemic in big cities?

     try to invent the internet

11.7.19  4:09 pm   do you ever have trouble starting when told, but have no trouble starting when you choose?

     INSUFFICIENT DATA FOR MEANINGFUL ANSWER

11.7.19  3:49 pm   would you say your music is heavily influenced by that of syd barret or david bowie?

     absolutely not. but i have heard the bike song and it is goals

11.7.19  3:48 pm   what inspired u to make music

     music itself

11.7.19  3:29 pm   Where can you buy "sexy pants"?

     the trick is you just gotta buy normal pants, and then as soon as you put them on that's when the sex happens

11.7.19  3:26 pm   Is your internal "soundtrack-of-your-life" similar to your musical style?  Or does your day-to-day life journey have a different vibe/tone?

     usually it's whatever the last song i heard, that song imprinted in my brain and won't stop until i hear a different song, or think of a different song

      Is your musical style just your "life's work" (object of your journey) or is it closer to being a reflection of your experience in life (representation of your subjective journey)?  

     i just try to write stuff that would blow my mind if i heard it for the first time. whether or not i have ever succeeded in that, is open to debate

      One possibility I've found myself considering is that your music represents a mix between your efforts to 1. refocus your attention on what will keep your outlook positive and bring you closer to your goals, and 2. recontextualize the internal and external challenges you face in a way that allows you to face them in an arena of your choosing.  But I'm doing a hell of a lot of projecting here.  

Slightly unrelated.  I know you don't like listening to your finished music because of superstition-related reasons, but does this keep you from singing and pla ying old songs just for the enjoyment of it?

     it's more enjoyable to play new songs, or to play other people's old songs, in a new way. it would also be enjoyable to play my own songs in a new way, but we'll save that for the stage, with the band

      needless to say, if you don't feel like answering the questions themselves but you have some thoughts I'd love to hear em.  Thx Bill!

11.7.19  2:53 pm   What question would make you say, "Insufficient data for meaningful answer?"

     at least half the questions here, but i never thought of saying that. usually i just get mad for about 1 and a half seconds, and then i snap out of it and try to use it as an invitation for creativity

11.7.19  2:52 pm   your thoughts on acapella?

     seems legit

11.7.19  2:43 pm   do you eat paper

     no

11.7.19  1:55 pm   is there still a long long way to go forward?

     let me perform some calculations, yes

11.7.19  1:44 pm   Is reality actually happening right now?

     let me perform some calculations, yes

11.7.19  12:50 pm   Is a chair a sexual object?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.7.19  12:43 pm   who is your favorite artist

     you
